laboratory_examinations.findings: Sodium: 135 mmol/L; Potassium: 4.3 mmol/L; Chloride: 105 mmol/L; Bicarbonate: 21 mmol/L; Creatinine: 0.7 mg/dL; Glucose: 70 mg/dL
Calcium: 11.4 mg/dL (normal range: 8.8-10.5 mg/dL); Albumin: 3.4 g/dL (normal range: 3.6-4.6 g/dL)
ALT: 18 U/L (normal range: 7-40 U/L); AST: 45 U/L (normal range: 6-40 U/L); Alkaline Phosphatase: 159 U/L (normal range: 27-110 U/L); Total Bilirubin: 0.3 mg/dL (normal range: 0.3-1.2 mg/dL)
Amylase: 617 U/L (normal range: 20-70 U/L); Lipase: 1261 U/L (normal range: 3-60 U/L)
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Lipase: increased to 2008 U/L; Amylase: increased to 833 U/L upon repeat testing

laboratory_examinations.findings: Ionized Calcium: 1.42 mmol/L (normal range: 1.13-1.32 mmol/L); Intact PTH: 52.6 pg/mL (normal range: 11-80 pg/mL); 25-Hydroxyvitamin D: 12 ng/mL (normal range: 30-60 ng/mL); 1,25-Dihydroxyvitamin D: 96 pg/mL (normal range: 15-75 pg/mL)
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: PTH decreased from 344 to 60.7 pg/mL after resection of adenoma

laboratory_examinations.findings: Calcium: 10.1 mg/dL; Intact PTH: 85.4 pg/mL; Phosphorus: 2.3 mg/dL (normal range: 2.4-5.0 mg/dL)
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Calcium improved from 11.1 to 10.1 mg/dL after treatment; normal upon discharge
Postoperative monitoring showed calcium levels normalized and remained normal during pregnancy

laboratory_examinations.findings: Increased to 30 ng/mL after vitamin D treatment
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Increase from 12 ng/mL to 30 ng/mL after treatment
